name: Nanoui
description: The book of Nanoui has been stolen, plunging the kingdom into chaos and allowing the forces of evil to rise. Set in a fantasy world of great castles, magic and dragons, our four heroes begin their quest to retrieve the powerful artifact and save the kingdom.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Dual Core 1.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 750, Radeon R7 240, 1GB VRAM, Shader Model 5.0 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space Additional Notes: *IntelÂ® HD Graphics not supported
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 570, 4 GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
